article: This is a photo of Mr. King's family. Mr. and Mrs. King  have got  two sons and a daughter. They are in England. Mrs. King is  _  Chinese teacher. Mr. King is a bus driver.  _  daughter is eleven and  _  is a student. Her name is Kathy. She is in Class Four  _  No. 1 Middle School. There are thirty students in her class. Tom and David  _  her brothers. They are nine years old. They are younger. They are  _  , too. They go to school  _  7: 30. They have  four lessons  in the morning and two in the afternoon. Tom and David like  _  and they play it every day. They love their sister very much.
